text: The 2002 Individual Speedway European Championship ==Qualification== *Semi- Final A: **August 11, 2002 ** Lendava *Semi-Final B: **May 18, 2002 ** Terenzano *Scandinavian Final (Semi-Final C): **June 7, 2002 ** Hagfors ==Final== *September 7, 2002 * Rybnik ==See also== 2002 Euro I
title: 2002 Individual Speedway European Championship
